actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution relating to the proposed reorganization of the field and insuring offices of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Department of Housing and Urban Development should not implement the proposed reorganization of the field and insuring offices of the Department of Housing and Urban Development prior to the time when the appropriate committees of the Congress have had an opportunity to hold hearings on such reorganization.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the proposed reorganization of the field and insuring offices of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
